todos.text: Go grocery shopping: buy fresh vegetables, fruits, and ingredients for meal prep this week
Deep clean the house: vacuum, mop floors, dust furniture, and organize the living room
Pay monthly bills: electricity, water, internet, and credit card statement
Exercise for 30 minutes: go for a jog in the park or do a home workout routine
Read a chapter of the new novel I bought last week and write a short reflection

completedTodos.text: Prepare a healthy dinner: grilled chicken with roasted vegetables and quinoa
Call my best friend to catch up and plan our weekend get-together

todos.text: 去超市採購：買新鮮蔬菜、水果，以及本週餐點準備所需的食材
大掃除：吸塵、拖地、擦拭家具，整理客廳
繳交月度帳單：電費、水費、網路費和信用卡帳單
運動30分鐘：到公園慢跑或在家做一套健身運動
閱讀上週買的新小說的一個章節，並寫下簡短的心得

completedTodos.text: 準備健康晚餐：烤雞肉配烤蔬菜和藜麥
打電話給好朋友聊近況，並計劃週末聚會
